## My favourite Plot

```{r}
library(mclust)
data(banknote)

library(ggplot2)

# Create a histogram with fill colors
ggplot(banknote, aes(x = Length, fill = Status)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.1, color = "black") +
  labs(title = "Histogram of Banknote Length by Status",
       x = "Length",
       y = "Count")
```
